Job Description

Job #: 879827

Description: * Drive business decisions by providing quantitative and qualitative data analysis and reporting of patterns, insights, and trends to decision-makers
  • Collect, aggregate, and analyze data from multiple internal and external sources to drive insights into business performance
  • Produce actionable reports that show key performance indicators and identify areas of improvement into current operations
  • Communicate findings and insight to stakeholders and provide business strategy recommendations for optimizing business performance
Responsibilities:
  • Reviews, analyzes, and evaluates business requirements and vendor product requirements to translate into IT technical requirements and scope documents
  • Participates in product sessions and provides input on product and current industry trends to decision makers
  • Responsible for guiding the Business Analyst in daily functions
  • Responsible for overseeing and recommending new process while ensuring all deliverables are accurate and timely
  • Will oversee the project form end to end
  • Produce actionable reports that show key performance indicators, identify areas of improvement into current system and business flows, and display root cause analysis of problems and issues
  • Will assist with the analysis phase of incorporating a new vendor product and supporting/supplementing new business processes/flows
  • Will be viewed as a lead on the project
  • Responsible for assisting the Business Analyst with interactions between the business and partners
Experience:
  • Requires 10+ years of airline experience, with emphasis on Airline Availability distribution, airline industry messaging, and airline revenue management and passenger serve systems - PSS knowledge
  • Experience with implementing and working with vendor system, particularly SaaS vendor products, is a plus
  • Strong understanding of the enterprise required
  • Must have a technical and functional understanding of the airline industry
  • Strong presentation and communication skills required
  • Bachelors Degree required
